meanings.sent1: Her outfit had so much pizazzes, with all the sparkles and colors.
meanings.sent2: The party was full of pizazzes, from the decorations to the music.
meanings.sent3: The magician's hat added a touch of pizazzes to his performance.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline at night had a certain pizazzes that was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The movie's special effects added pizazzes to the action scenes.

meanings.definition: Pizazzes (verb): To add flair or excitement to something
meanings.sent1: She pizazzes up her cupcakes with colorful frosting and sprinkles.
meanings.sent2: The designer pizazzes the runway show with bold patterns and accessories.
meanings.sent3: The comedian pizazzes his jokes with funny voices and gestures.
meanings.sent4: The singer pizazzes her performance with high notes and dance moves.
meanings.sent5: The chef pizazzes the dish with a drizzle of sauce and fresh herbs.
